actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to include as an affiliated group for purposes of the transportation excise tax union locals and their tax exempt trusts and wholly owned corporations, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt labor unions and their tax-exempt trusts established for the sole and exclusive benefit of their members from the excise tax on air transportation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to include as an affiliated group for purposes of the transportation excise tax union locals and their tax exempt trusts and wholly owned corporations, and for other purposes.
